assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Lauren McKnight is currently serving on the council of the Science Teachers Association of New South Wales, Australia (STANSW). B.T, A.P., A.W., and M-A.Y declare no competing interests. All educational materials and professional development were provided free of charge to teachers.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
